title: The middle class are urbanizing at a rapid speed, can the global food system keep up? Is reducing food waste the key?
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Impact - Today 
Between 2010 and 2025 one billion people earning more than $10 a day will move from rural areas into a city. These new city-dwellers will be...
